pages.name: Sea Serpent
pages.text: $(thing)Sea serpents$()$(#734608) are the "dragons of the sea" having long serpentine bodies and colorful scales

$(#734608)Sea serpents can be found commonly in oceans coming in various colors and sizes. The largest ones are known to be called "ancient sea serpents" and are much more powerful$(br2)They are extremely aggressive and will swiftly take a large bite out of their prey or leap high up out of the water to slam their target. If far away, the sea serpent will fire a jet of scalding water that deals damage over time

$(#734608)Using a fragile boat to maneuver around a sea serpent is $(o)incredibly$()$(#734608) dangerous and reckless. One might only hope to ride an armored hippocampus to traverse the water quickly enough$(br2)Should a sea serpent be felled, it will drop its colored $(item)sea serpent scales$()$(#734608), $(item)sea serpent fangs$()$(#734608), and rarely its skull

$(#734608)The sea serpent scales can be used to craft powerful $(item)tide guardian armor$()$(#734608) or crafted with fangs to create a strong $(item)tide trident$()$(#734608). They could also be used to craft $(item)tide arrow$()$(#734608) which pierce through the water
